casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Hughes, Appellant.
Submitted September 29, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Ralph, Russell Hughes, appellant, in propria persona.
A. J. Kmdenyi, First Assistant District Attorney, and Joseph E. Kovach, District Attorney,, for Commonwealth, appellee.
January 30, 1970:
